item.title: 据加拿大国家警察局称，该局周五遭到了一次规模 "惊人 "的网络攻击。
item.description:
Canada's national police force was hit with a cyberattack Friday that was of "alarming" magnitude, according to the agency. https://t.co/WRV97RFMrm pic.twitter.com/slYwz3r7Pp

item.title: 密西西比州官员称，两名国民警卫队队员周五在密西西比州的一次例行训练飞行中乘坐的军用直升机坠毁，造成两人死亡。密西西比州州长说，两人都在位于图佩罗的密西西比国民警卫队陆军航空支援设施服役。
item.description:
Two National Guardsmen are dead after their military helicopter crashed in Mississippi during a routine training flight on Friday, officials said. Both served at a Mississippi National Guard Army aviation support facility in Tupelo, the governor said.https://t.co/zhfNbsG68K pic.twitter.com/TJIXTauXdC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 新公布的录像显示，非二元制青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中发生肢体冲突一天后死亡，她描述了导致打架的原因。
item.description:
Newly released footage shows Nex Benedict, a nonbinary teen who died one day after a physical altercation at their high school, describing what led up to the fight. https://t.co/gD6F4Wc6ls

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 英国执政党保守党在一名议员指责伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）受伊斯兰教徒控制后，暂停了与该议员的联系，以色列-哈马斯战争引发的紧张局势令英国政坛动荡不安。
item.description:
The U.K.’s governing Conservative Party has suspended ties with one if its lawmakers after he accused London Mayor Sadiq Khan of being controlled by Islamists, as tensions over the Israel-Hamas war roil British politics. https://t.co/kwuLEGqKgv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 时隔两年，俄乌战争仍在继续。以下是过去 12 个月中发生的几件大事。
item.description:
After two years, the Russia-Ukraine war is still ongoing. Here are a few key events from the last 12 months. https://t.co/dKOtOKBVPV pic.twitter.com/HlVSLRhYCf

item.title: 最新消息：以美国和英国为首的多国联军对也门胡塞武装发动了新一轮打击，"以回应胡塞武装在红海及其周边地区对商船和海军船只的持续袭击"。
item.description:
BREAKING: A coalition of countries led by the U.S. and U.K. carried out a new round of strikes on the Houthis in Yemen "in response to the Houthis' continued attacks against commercial and naval vessels" in and around the Red Sea, officials said. https://t.co/QkPGtwlfpP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 新公布的人体摄影机录像显示，非二元制青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中与其他几名学生发生肢体冲突后一天死亡。
item.description:

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会的调查人员称，一架载有尼日利亚最大银行之一首席执行官和其他五人的直升机本月早些时候在南加州莫哈韦沙漠坠毁，留下了一个浅坑。
item.description:
Investigators with the National Transportation Safety Board say a helicopter that was carrying the CEO of one of Nigeria’s largest banks and five others left a shallow crater when it crashed earlier this month in Southern California’s Mojave Desert. https://t.co/ozvptjC6W7

item.title: 苏格兰的科学家揭示了一个惊人的发现：一条 "非常奇特 "的 2.4 亿年前的 "中国龙 "化石。

item.title: 近两年前，俄罗斯人在前线附近接走了她的父亲。从那以后，她就再也没有他的消息了。

item.description:

item.title: 现年 99 岁的前总统吉米-卡特（Jimmy Carter）是第一位在世时获得白宫官方圣诞饰品殊荣的美国总统。
item.description:

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院做出冷冻胚胎属于 "儿童 "的判决后，试管婴儿治疗暂停，妇女们描述了她们的反应。 阅读更多

Women describe their reactions after IVF treatments were paused in Alabama following the state Supreme Court issued a decision that frozen embryos are "children."

item.title: 火星探索的未来即将到来，美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在招募公民志愿者，帮助实现这一未来。美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在招募符合条件的人员，参加在模拟版红色星球上进行的为期一年的任务。
item.description:
The future of Mars exploration is on the horizon and NASA is recruiting citizen volunteers to help make that future a reality. NASA is recruiting qualified individuals to participate in a yearlong mission on a simulated version of the Red Planet. https://t.co/IIGlevbXaG pic.twitter.com/snnqF8E2WS

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 2020 年的今天，数学家凯瑟琳-约翰逊（Katherine Johnson）逝世，她在美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的开拓性工作通过书籍和电影《隐藏人物》广为人知。她享年 101 岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: Mathematician Katherine Johnson — whose trailblazing work at NASA became widely known through the book and film "Hidden Figures" — died on this day in 2020. She was 101. https://t.co/v53zL2oYoj pic.twitter.com/5z1vJVzcsw

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024
